name: Meppadiyan
description: Meppadiyan is a Malayalam drama, helmed by Vishnu Mohan. Meppadiyan is based on true incidents, the movie is based on the life of a commone man 'Jayakrishnan'.
Actor: Unni Mukundan, Kottayam Ramesh, Saiju Kurup, Aju Varghese, Anju Kurian, Nisha Sarang, Kalabhavan Shajohn
